name: Smote
effect: Target one model within 12". That model takes 1D6 HP damage. On failure to cast, Caster takes damage instead

name: Transfusion
effect: Target one model within 12". That model heals 1D6 HP and caster takes 1 HP damage

name: Warp
effect: Target one model within 12". On success, model moves 1D6" in direction caster chooses, suffering falling penalties

name: Toxins
effect: Target one model within 12". On success, target becomes Poisoned

name: Blind
effect: Target one model within 12". On success, target becomes Blinded for remainder of Scenario

name: Fear
effect: Target one model within 12". On success, target must make morale test or flee

name: Shield
effect: Caster gains +1 Armor Value for remainder of Scenario

name: Haste
effect: Target friendly model within 12". That model gains +2 Agility for remainder of Scenario

name: Heal
effect: Target friendly model within 12". That model heals 1D6 HP

name: Fireball
effect: All models within 3" of target point take 1D6 damage
